arcBlasters.name: Arc Blasters
text: After a figure resolves a {RANGED} attack, each figure that suffered 1 or more {DMG} tests {STR}. Each figure that fails is Stunned.

combatVeteran.name: Combat Veteran
text: While attacking, apply +2 Accuracy and +1 {DMG} to the results.

criticalHit.name: Critical Hit
text: While attacking, apply +2 {DMG} to the results.

deadeye.name: Deadeye
text: While attacking, apply +2 Accuracy to the results.

experimentalArms.name: Experimental Arms
text: After the attack is resolved, the attacking figure suffers +1 {DMG}.

exploitWeakness.name: Exploit Weakness
text: All targets attacked by figures in this group apply -1 {BLOCK} to their defense results.

fleetFooted.name: Fleet Footed
text: All figures gain 1 extra movement point.

heavyPressure.name: Heavy Pressure
text: After attacking a target, the target suffers an additional 1 {STRAIN}.

imperialIndustry.name: Imperial Industry
text: Each figure in this group gains:{BREAK}

marksman.name: Marksman
text: Figures do not block line of sight for attacks.

noQuarter.name: No Quarter
text: If attacking a hero who has suffered 2 or more {STRAIN}, apply +1 {SURGE} to the results.

riotGrenades.name: Riot Grenades
text: All rebel heroes within 3 spaces of a figure in this group tests {INSIGHT}.{BREAK}

savageWeaponry.name: Savage Weaponry
text: Apply surge effect before all others.

shockTroopers.name: Shock Troopers
text: While attacking a figure within 4 spaces, apply +1 {SURGE} to the results.

showOfForce.name: Show of Force
text: While declaring an attack, become focused (limit once per activation).

surgicalStrike.name: Surgical Strike
text: After attacking a target, the target suffers an additional 1 {STRAIN} and 1 {DMG} if they suffered any damage.

sustainedFire.name: Sustained Fire
text: After resolving an attack, perform an additional attack if the unit has another action left. Then, become stunned and suffer 2 {DMG}.
